quote: Your beliefs become your thoughts,
author: Gandhi

quote: The truth is that everyone is bored, and devotes himself to cultivating habits.
author: Albert Camus

quote: A man who can't bear to share his habits is a man who needs to quit them.
author: Stephen King

quote: An over-indulgence of anything, even something as pure as water, can intoxicate.
author: Criss Jami

quote: The chains of habit are too weak to be felt until they are too strong to be broken.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: You can't make yourself feel positive, but you can choose how to act, and if you choose right, it builds your confidence.
author: Julien Smith

quote: We become what we repeatedly do.
author: Sean Covey

quote: Sow a thought, and you reap an act;
author: Samuel Smiles

quote: A morning coffee is my favorite way of starting the day, settling the nerves so that they don't later fray.
author: Marcia Carrington

quote: It is a very inconvenient habit of kittens (Alice had once made the remark) that whatever you say to them, they always purr.
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: Ronan did not smoke; he preferred his habits with hangovers.
author: Maggie Stiefvater

quote: Enthusiasm is the electricity of life. How do you get it? You act enthusiastic until you make it a habit.
author: Gordon Parks

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: Nothing so needs reforming as other people's habits.
author: Mark Twain

quote: A nail is driven out by another nail; habit is overcome by habit.
author: Erasmus

quote: Some rules are nothing but old habits that people are afraid to change.
author: Therese Fowler

quote: The best kind of happiness is a habit you're passionate about.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Have you noticed how many people who walk in the shade curse the Sun?
author: Idries Shah

quote: If you are rude, cynical, habitually-sarcastic or pessimistic, your life options are going to be very limited.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: How to win in life:
author: Germany Kent

quote: I am a Smedry, and we do ridiculous, unexpected, eccentric things like this all the time! Ha-ha!
author: Brandon Sanderson

quote: 6 Ways To Give Your Mind A Break:
author: Germany Kent

quote: You have a bad habit of listing anything that can go wrong, Volger."
author: Scott Westerfeld

quote: Good habits are worth being fanatical about.
author: John Irving

quote: H is for Habit, winners make a habit of doing the things losers don't want to do.
author: Lucas Remmerswaal

quote: Everything you are used to, once done long enough, starts to seem natural, even though it might not be.
author: Julien Smith

quote: She liked the life she had. She loved habits. She craved a day with nothing in it, a long, quiet stretch of hours in the studio.
author: Ann Brashares

quote: Just do it! First you make your habits, then your habits make you!
author: Lucas Remmerswaal

quote: I is for Integrity, be honest with yourself and others.
author: Lucas Remmerswaal

quote: Assiduity, it means sit down until you do it. Commit yourself to your work and study.
author: Lucas Remmerswaal

quote: S is for SCARY! Fear is driven out by action! Bad habits are overcome by good habits.
author: Lucas Remmerswaal

quote: The fixity of a habit is generally in direct proportion to its absurdity.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: Dream, think BIG live the life of your dreams.
author: Lucas Remmerswaal

quote: Good habits are the basic tools that will determine whether you are a tortoise
author: Lucas Remmerswaal

quote: Z is for Zany! Master the Zany habit of thinking backwards. it will help you become a really great thinker!
author: Lucas Remmerswaal

quote: Some women have been faking orgasms for so long that they sometimes fake one when they are masturbating.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Let go of your old tired habits and plant new habits in fertile soil.
author: Harley King

quote: Your little choices become habits that affect the bigger decisions you make in life.
author: Elizabeth George

quote: If breaking a habit has been hard for you to do, hard for you even to face, then a helping hand is in order.
author: Kenneth Schwarz

quote: The more you do something the easier it gets. Don't expect it to get easier, if you're not putting in the time and energy to make that happen.
author: Akiroq Brost

quote: We must be aware that momentum born of old habits and destructive behaviors might be momentum, but it’s momentum slammed into reverse.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Journaling can be an excellent way to increase self-awareness, discover and change habits.
author: Akiroq Brost

quote: We are creatures of habit, and leveraging our habitual tendencies is one of the best ways to develop discipline.
author: Ernest Cadorin

quote: We only irritate ourselves when we scratch at an itch that no longer exists.
author: Jason N Versey

quote: When you learn to force yourself to practice for an hour or run fifteen laps, you start building self-regulatory strength.” Heatherton.
author: Charles Duhigg

quote: Small wins are exactly what they sound like, and are part of how keystone habits create widespread changes.
author: Charles Duhigg

quote: Life is a daily battle with people and things that are trying to change us and those that are trying to prevent us from changing.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Not tailgating acknowledges the mystery and humanity of strangers. It's one of those small habits that speaks volumes.
author: Marisa de los Santos

quote: I am neither drinking(alcohol) nor smoking. I just take TEA for Thinking, Energy, and Acting.
author: Dr Sivakumar Gowder

quote: Writing is work. Anyone can do this, anyone can learn to do this. It's not rocket science; it's habits of mind and habits of work.
author: Alexander Chee

quote: There is no harm in having big dreams. Rather have this as a habit. It's worth!
author: Kankane Rakhi Surendra

quote: Create daily habits that will create a higher quality of life. Remember, our lives become whatever we practice.
author: Akiroq Brost

quote: Build you a life you don't need to escape from by balancing your time, by taking rest when you need to, but doing things you love and enjoy.
author: Akiroq Brost

quote: Life really is a practice and becomes what you practice.
author: Akiroq Brost

quote: Doing what we love, investing in ourselves pays off.
author: Akiroq Brost

quote: Our lifestyle, our life, the way we think and do things, really is a practice; a daily practice.
author: Akiroq Brost

quote: Feeling happy is not conditional.
author: Akiroq Brost

quote: It's the creature of habit that gets caught in the rabbit's snare.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: Every bad habit is merely an unconscious decision to choose a distraction over having to deal with an uncomfortable feeling.
author: Antti Vanhanen

quote: Self-reflection is a much kinder teacher than regret is. Prioritize yourself by making a habit of it.
author: Andrena Sawyer

quote: Customer service has everything to do with consistency, systems, training, and the habits you and your team create.
author: Amber Hurdle

quote: Habits, places and faces grew into you over time, like tree roots burrowing into stone work.
author: Frances Hardinge

quote: Those very habits promoting emotional distance keep us from experiencing the love we so desperately long for and the love we are meant to give away.
author: Erin M. Straza

quote: Enjoy good moments while they last. Then make sure, they're not the last
author: Constance Friday Elias

quote: Self-protection by bravado is a hard habit to break.
author: Joan Ball

quote: He was forty-eight — an age at which permanence of habits begins to be predictable.
author: James Hilton

quote: Habits are hard to let go, especially if they are human beings.
author: Drishti Bablani

quote: The question we should be asking ourselves is: "Who do I need to become?
author: Darren Hardy

quote: Sadly, plastering a new coat of ideas on the base of same old weary thoughts and habits is only going to worsen the situation.
author: Vishal Ostwal

quote: Tolstoy described boredom as “a desire for desires,” while the working-class Chekhov wrote about it primarily as a desire for escape.
author: Mary Mann

quote: Warning...well-loved stories are habit forming...
author: Nanette L. Avery

quote: Habits are tools. They can either propel you toward success or drag you down.
author: Silvica Rosca

quote: The parrot wipes its beak although it is clean.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Your choices, purposes, and habits ultimately define your life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: His mom calls him Berger?
author: Matthew Rosenberg

quote: A man does not know the full depth of his thoughts till he picks up a pen and writes;
author: Eniitan Akinola

quote: Awareness, Acceptance, Alternatives, and Actions are the four habits necessary to become Type Me.
author: Melissa Heisler

quote: Advice to my younger self:
author: Germany Kent

quote: Habits are hard to let go, especially if they are human beings.
author: Drishti Bablani, Wordions

quote: Everyone smiles in the same language,
author: Ana Claudia Antunes

quote: Great people become great due to the framework, routines and habits they have set for themselves
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Being on time is a filthy habit practised only by roosters and retirees.
author: Catherynne M. Valente

quote: It shouldn't take a life-changing event for you to change your life.
author: Shaun Hick

quote: Some writers write to forget. Some forget to write.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Habits grow like dragons if you feed them.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: Always remember: marriage is a gift. Allow the revelation to direct your thoughts and habits in marriage.
author: Ngina Otiende

quote: You got to get out into the field. Secondhand information in this world only takes you so far.
author: Sally J. Pla

quote: Habits are hard to let go, especially if they are human beings.
author: Wordions

quote: Gratitude is a powerful catalyst for happiness.
author: Amy Collette

quote: Your brain loves habits because they are simple, structured, well-known, energy efficient, quick, and automatic.
author: Stan Jacobs

quote: Habits are safer than rules; you don't have to watch them. And you don't have to keep them either. They keep you.
author: Frank Crane

quote: The quality of your life is in direct relationship to the quality of your habits and rituals.
author: Stan Jacobs

quote: Your habits guide and sculpt your path. The same process that builds habits can break habits.
author: Farshad Asl

quote: Anyone who has ever achieved anything has been a steward of his potential.
author: Chris Matakas

quote: Hard habit to break, friendship.
author: Rachel Caine

quote: Do not become attached to anything that can destroy you in the course of time.
author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

quote: The victim mindset will have you dancing with the devil, then complaining that you're in hell.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Saving is a great habit but without investing and tracking, it just sleeps
author: Manoj Arora

quote: I am what I am today because of the choices I made yesterday,
author: Stephen R. Covey

quote: Good habits are the key to all success. Bad habits are the unlocked door to failure.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Chronic problems tend to come from chronic habits.
author: Clifford Cohen

quote: Bad habits have brought me this far: why change such a tried-and-true formula?
author: Christopher Hitchens

quote: Despise your weakness, not yourself.
author: Constance Chuks Friday

quote: Old habits will keep you stuck as they won't open doors to new opportunities.
author: Karon Waddell

quote: Some kleptomaniacs do not steal things only; they also, while some only, steal lovers.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Drifting with things is a habit it takes almost dying to break.
author: Marge Piercy

quote: Where we
author: Stephen R. Covey

quote: Time makes the ordinary extraordinary and the extraordinary ordinary.
author: Kevin Focke

quote: His childhood passed in quiet anxiety.
author: Jen Pollock Michel

quote: Why, Reshi?"The words poured out of Bast in a sudden gush. "Why did you stay there when it was so awful?"
author: Patrick Rothfuss

quote: A five-year-old who can follow the ball for ten minutes becomes a sixth grader who can start his homework on time.
author: Charles Duhigg

quote: I am not sad anymore.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: I should pursue only those habits that would make me feel freer and stronger.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: After a bad trip, don't carry your luggage on board the next flight. Stay grounded til you figure out a new way to travel.
author: T.F. Hodge

quote: You will find the reality of life by reading.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If we want something to count in our lives, we should figure out a way to count it.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: You can live in the body you wish; exercise daily.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The more you read, the more you will love to read.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Relax and rejuvenate your sacred-spirit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The greatest adventure is reading!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Dancing daily is a good physical activity.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: mere acquisition isn't enough to establish a good habit
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: Love your body. Exercise for 10-15 minutes daily.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: These tasks weren't urgent (which was the reason they didn't get done), but because they weighed on my mind, they sapped my energy.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: The usefulness of a man or woman of God relies on the ability to remain distinct.
author: Kevin Thoman

quote: I love reading.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Culture eats strategy for breakfast. Peter Drucker
author: Matt Chandler

quote: Live a healthy life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Be youthful.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I nurture daily wellness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I treat my thoughts like an old person treats their valuables: I cannot for the life of me proceed to throwing them out.
author: Criss Jami

quote: What are we but the some total of our habits and lifestyle.
author: Aporva Kala

quote: Children should never have baths,’ my grandmother said. ‘It's a dangerous
author: Roald Dahl

quote: We change when circumstances necessitate it; we adapt because we have to. The real challenge is to change when circumstances don’t demand it at all.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: I can write three hundred and sixty-five grateful thanks.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You must resist negative thoughts, negative criticism and negative influences.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: People only keep their eyes open out of habit. And, nothing more.
author: S.D. Lawendowski

quote: The initiative to undertake your most important duty in life is often buried beneath the accumulated debris of human habits.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: You must make time daily to care for your mental, physical, spiritual and emotional health.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Positive words are well spring of hope and healing.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Motivation may be what starts you off, but it's habit that keeps you going back for more.
author: Miya Yamanouchi

quote: Cultivate the habit to write gratitude daily.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Positive mindset, positive self-image and positive attitude are the best-habits to nurture.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Self-love is self-care.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The poet is poor, but the orator is made by cultivation." Horace
author: John Taliaferro

quote: Good well-being leads to good working performance.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Health is the greatest strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A joyful soul is the choice to dwell on amazing gift of life than the challenges.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If you do not write the thoughts of the moments, it is lost forever.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You ought to write down the glow of thoughts as it’s ignites.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Keep your heart always warm.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Do not use either harsh words or negative words. They only bring sadness and weaken the soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Lincoln had a stubborn concern for first principles.
author: Richard Brookhiser

quote: Liberty is no less a blessing because oppression has so long darkened the mind that it can not appreciate it.
author: Lucretia Mott

quote: Positive results will come when you start to replace your negative thoughts and habits with positive ones.
author: Robert Tew

quote: You don’t get lucky without preparation, and there’s no sense in being prepared if you’re not open to the possibility of a glorious accident.
author: Twyla Tharp

quote: Make your habits your beloved home.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I don't like good habits. They strike me as being so easily broken.
author: Linnea Gelland

quote: Old habits die hard, especially for soldiers.
author: Jocelyn  Murray

quote: Habits of action cultivated early in life lay the foundation for unique skill sets able to carve a path beyond the mundane and into the relevant.
author: Marian Deegan

quote: To change any behavior we have to slow down and act intentionally rather than from habit and impulse.
author: Henna Inam

quote: The secret, the alcoholics said, was God.
author: Charles Duhigg

quote: We must read, mediate and affirm the writings of Holy Scriptures, to partake in the divine nature and overcome the struggles of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A negative habit is a matter of frequent negative thoughts and beliefs in one's mind, but never a result of the complexion of one's skin.
author: Edmond Mbiaka

quote: If you observe nature daily, it brings harmony with you and God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Develop the habit of initiating change. You'll be better prepared for whatever comes your way.
author: Gina Greenlee

quote: Two basic principles; reading God’s word and praying regularly.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: He looked at the menu dreamily. 'God, it’s good to be eating in France again.'
author: Jack Iams

quote: Never let those who are very accustomed to playing small, talk you out of the habit of dreaming big.
author: Edmond Mbiaka

quote: Every successful man knows what a persevering life it was to achieve his goal.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Give diligence if you would get assurance.
author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quote: Cultivate the habit of making aware choice. Your choice makes your destiny. Do not be carried away by the unconscious choices.
author: Amit Ray

quote: Great habits sharpen our thoughts and make us great.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You will be able to change your life to what you want it to be only by taking responsibility for your own actions
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: You need to decide what your life is going to look like!
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: As an innovator, you need to be aware of how traditions, habits and bias can act as barriers to accepting new ideas.
author: Max McKeown

quote: Habits gradually change the face of one's life as time changes one's physical face; & one does not know it.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: You can change your life and make it what you want it to be, but only if you take consistent action.
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: Eventually your little choices are going to become habits that affect the bigger decisions you make in life.
author: Jim George

quote: The key is to realize that you have a choice on how to spend your money.
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: Old Ways May Not Give You Up
author: James M.  Robinson

quote: Do you want to be rich spiritually? Begin by building godly habits.
author: Lori Hatcher

quote: We change, but always at a cost: to win this you lose that.
author: Geoffrey Wolff

quote: You can decide to ignore the naysayers, put your head down and work on becoming the best you can.
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: Watching TV together does not count as dedicated family time!
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: To get more money to spend on yourself - don't buy on credit!
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: Don't buy on credit. This habit, more than any other, will eventually guarantee your financial independence, no matter what your income.
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: Old habits for old people; reinvent yourself while you still can!
author: T.F. Hodge

quote: Courage is a requirement for facing your fears, doing things differently, and applying any new habits that align with and support your goals.
author: John    Manning

quote: He, who dares seek God's presence, will receive His blessings and favours.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Old habits for old people; reinvent yourself!
author: T.F. Hodge

quote: Spiritual disciplines answer the shallow world.
author: Richard J Foster

quote: Even when he played, he made a business of it.
author: H.W. Brands

quote: Thus heaven's gift to us is this:
author: Alexander Pushkin

quote: Cultivate the habit of defining, refining, redefining and redeeming your opportunities. Failure is a temporal event, not a permanent trademark.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: It is one thing to know about your dysfunctional habits but quite another to change them.
author: David W. Earle LPC- Love is Not Enough

quote: Conscious thought is required to design and build the life you want for yourself.
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: Random acts of kindness don't have to be big or even cost money. It will however make you a better person.
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: For discipline is imposed not just on oneself but on those in one's orbit.
author: Philip Roth

quote: She is forever buying things because it is so cheap! That's financial suicide.
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: Sitting on the hot seat of change requires much courage, patience, and persistence.
author: David W. Earle LPC- Love is Not Enough

quote: Cultivate the habit of setting clearly-defined written goals; they are the road maps that guide you to your destination.
author: Roy   Bennett

quote: Thanking someone is such a simple thing, but it is extremely rewarding, both to the giver and the receiver.
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: Make a conscious decision, no matter what it is, and know that that choice will have consequences.
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: Strange how reluctant I was to acknowledge that control of my fate lay beyond my own conscious will. Habit of a lifetime, I suppose.
author: Patrick McGrath

quote: Don't do things simply because everybody around you does it.
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: Don't presume that your loved ones know that you love them - say it, and say it often!
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: Don't you dare not take action on the new things you've learnt by reading this book!
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: Evaluate everything that you do, and decide if it serves or hinders you in becoming the best that you can be.
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: I will help people become the best that they can be.
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: If you are serious about changing your life, you have to get into the habit of finishing what you started!
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: In this context, does it sound like building habits is something worthwhile doing? You bet it does!
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: It's your money. Make a conscious choice on how you're going to spend it!
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: A parent knows that his or her parenting has been a success if the kids, once grown, still want to be friends.
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: A book is a treasure of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The best way to get promoted is to work yourself out of a job.
author: Eddie  de Jong

quote: If you believe you can change - if you make it a habit - the change becomes real.
author: Charles Duhigg

quote: As you grow old, if you don't earn some money or inspiration out of your hobby, you will stop pursuing your hobby.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Emotions manipulates the man more than habits do.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Good character going bad is like a beast escaping it's cage; it will be hard to capture it again!
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Our actions, habits, character, and future are most definitely affected by our thoughts.
author: Elizabeth George

quote: But sometimes we are not drawn to that which is different from what we know and fear. Sometimes we are drawn to that which is exactly the same.
author: Laura Schroff

quote: The brain has this amazing ability to find happiness even when the memories of it are gone.
author: Charles Duhigg

quote: Virtue is what happens when habitual choices have been wise.
author: N.T. Wright

quote: Habits are good if you have the habit of the best.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Thoughts close more doors then they open. This causes limitation.
author: Charles F. Glassman

quote: Your greatest moments of challenge are a call to defy your timid habits of safety and rush out into life.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Habits of the mind also provide our mental framework – the way we see the world
author: Gyalwa Dokhampa

quote: Excessive self-criticism is a bad habit and extraordinarily self-destructive. Don't be your own worst enemy!
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Good tradecraft keeps espionage routine and boring.
author: Vejas Gabriel Liulevicius

quote: Bad habits are like having a sumo wrestler in the back of your canoe rowing the opposite direction.
author: J Loren Norris

quote: Better spend time working hard to maintain your good habits because you may look for time to recover it but to no avail!
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Change might not be fast and it isn't always easy. But with time and effort, almost any habit can be reshaped.
author: Charles Duhigg

quote: Life has a way of taking its toll on the person you thought you were.
author: A.S.A. Harrison

quote: If you continue to dig the same hole in the same place in your life, eventually you will be standing in a grave.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: There is no more miserable human being than one in whom nothing is habitual but indecision.
author: William James

quote: I guess we always find excuses to keep on with our bad habits, don't we?
author: Stephen King

quote: Cultivate only the habits that you are willing should master you.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: First we form habits, then they form us.
author: Mark Matteson

quote: It is not really a small thing when in small things we resist self.
author: Thomas à Kempis

quote: Everybody wants a happy life and a peaceful mind, but we have to produce peace of mind through our own practice.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: The best way to stop a bad habit is to never begin it
author: J. C. Penney

quote: The habit of doing more than is necessary can only be earned through practice.
author: Seth Godin

quote: Trying to change old habits is like fighting a war in your head—a draining and exhausting skirmish that makes you wonder at your chance of survival.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: Bad habits: easy to develop and hard to live with. Good habits: hard to develop and easy to live with.
author: Orrin Woodward

quote: A character for steadiness once gone is not easily recovered
author: Thomas Hughes

quote: Weight loss is a sum of all of your habits - not individual ones.
author: Helen M. Ryan

quote: The best gifts anyone can give to themselves are good health habits.
author: Ellen J. Barrier

quote: Oh, people get used to so many things," said Vadesh, "if only they give them selves a chance.
author: Orson Scott Card

quote: Continuous exercise can wear you down and wear you out. What once was a passion has now become just a chore that you dread.
author: Helen M. Ryan

quote: Americans love to hear good things about their bad habits.
author: T. Colin Campbell

quote: Habits form and habits grow,
author: Tito Rajarshi Mukhopadhyay

quote: Every day my mother had tea. My dad has his ritual cigar. They had their evening cocktail. Those rituals were done nicely, with flair and feeling.
author: John Travolta
